vooga.towerdefense.gameeditor.gamemaker.xmlwriters

Class ViewXMLWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • vooga.towerdefense.gameeditor.gamemaker.xmlwriters.ViewXMLWriter

  • public class ViewXMLWriter
extends java.lang.Object
    ViewXMLWriter writes the view properties of the game to the specified XML doc in the correct format.
    Author:
    Angelica Schwartz, Leonard Ng'eno
